term.title: HTML
term.short-definition: An abbreviation for "HyperText Markup Language". A standard for tagging and structuring text, images, videos, and other media on a web page. HTML can be used on first reference.
term.long-definition: An abbreviation for "HyperText Markup Language". A standard for tagging and structuring text, images, videos, and other media on a web page. HTML can be used on first reference.

term.title: API
term.short-definition: A software interface that lets third-party applications read and write to a system using programming language constructs or statements.
term.long-definition: An abbreviation for "application program interface". A software interface that lets third-party applications read and write to a system using programming language constructs or statements.
